title: Infatuation
description: Infatuation makes you do things you’ll regret later. Step-siblings at thirteen. Lovers at sixteen. Ella and Flynn have a lot of shared history. Their worlds were flipped upside down when their parents discovered their secret. Love makes you regret nothing. Now they’re adults and nothing can tear them apart again. Except for the one dark secret Ella’s keeping that could destroy everything. Love begins where infatuation ends…  Infatuation is a 20,000 word novella. It does not end with a cliffhanger.
author: Phoenyx Slaughter
